title: Pigeon that came home: a story of the Fjord country
brief_description: The life of Norwegian farm boys living by a fjord, enjoying swimming, fishing, boating and farming. They care for a pigeon “Lucky” and train her to carry messages. She plays her part in the exciting rescue when one of the boys has an accident. An introduction to Norway - its geography, people and customs.
